ModMetaData.name: Sacred White Fox - Upscaled
ModMetaData.author: Vinzero
ModMetaData.description:
HD Upscaled and redrawn version of Sacred White Fox.
Version differences - Three times the texture quality! - Completely redrawn by hand then upscaled to match modern modded texture quality. - Alternative Colors! Black and Amaterasu inspired! - FULL DDS Support! All textures have DDS included to use with "Graphic Settings+"
